Posts.Content: Hi,,,,,I had a Full Mastectomy with a latisso dormi muscle from my back reconstruction. My scar still pulls on my back and i have breast and arm lymphodema.....Perhaps you should go back to see your physio to see if she can help with your excersises to help make your scar a bit more supple. Hope i have been of as little help???
Posts.Title: long term effects of mastectomy

Posts.Content: I also had LD my drain was in quite a while after i left hospital. It really got on my nerves also. Just after i left hospital i found out i had MRSA i was very ill. But i pulled through it. Keep ur chin up Love Cherylxxx
Posts.Title: seroma following LD reconstruction
